title: Trouble purchasing RP
body:
I have tried to purchase RP a few times over the past few weeks, everytime I get up the the stage where it says - "Please do not close the window while payment is processing. 
In rare cases it can take up to 30 minutes for accounts to be credited."

I have waited for upwards of 30 minutes to no avail.

Does anyone know of anything that could cause this?

replies.body:
Hey there,

That definitely sounds odd, could you [send a ticket in to Player Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) regarding this issue so they can look into it for you.
I sent one in some time ago, still waiting on a reply!
